suppress.notes: The CVE-2018-1258 occurs from spring security libraries, despite the latest versions are used. This is confirmed as false positive and hence it is suppressed (https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2952)
We are on latest version , these are coming form mvn:pkg
Transitive dependency of spring boot version
oauth2-oidc-sdk vulnerabilities appearing even for latest version. False positive reported at https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/1658
This CVE is related to file type tag parsing. However, the associated CVE seems to be a false positive on the lang-tag jar.
